channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1447407615659679747
item.description: (10-oct-21) | Actualización de la situación de la pandemia en México a nivel nacional. Elaboración de @ArturoErdely, Director de Estadística, con datos de @SSalud_mx: https://t.co/PIjwNV6r9A. item.title: #es @ 1447382999100657665
item.description: @ppalaciosav @IDL_R La razón es simple. Revisa los datos abiertos para buscar los contratos directos de compra durante la pandemia de esos medicamentos. La última vez que hice eso desistí cuando estaba en una mini fortuna de millones de soles…

item.title: #fr @ 1447234640096468997
item.description: Un vacciné a plus de probabilité d’attraper le Covid qu’un non vacciné selon les données publiques anglaises. ✅Sur ce point, le vaccin a une efficacité négative et le passe sanitaire de @olivierveran est une idiotie sans nom https://t.co/emIe2IFaJR

item.title: #it @ 1447174059649867780
item.description:
Apprendiamo da un articolo del Corriere della Sera di un report 'riservato' in cui si metterebbero in dubbio - senza riportare cifre - i benefici del #Superbonus. Però i dati pubblici raccontano un'altra storia. A chi giova attaccare la nostra misura?
👇 https://t.co/T0BTFxagMO https://t.co/Cb9fGvlGXd

item.title: #en @ 1447147271922065409
item.description:
Finding it baffling that it’s 2021, we’ve had apps with lots of detail on public transport for a decade and…all I know about the rail replacement bus is that it exists.
Would it not help if @TfL actually put which stop bus uses in the TfL Go app and open data? And tracked them?

item.title: #en @ 1447142105625804803
item.description:
#EarthArt #eARTh
Broome Beach in western #Australia’s Kimberley region
Our #Sentinel 🇪🇺🛰️ #OpenData gives us beautiful images of our fragile planet, but also allow us to monitor water quality, coastal erosion, sea-level rise etc.
#Sentinel2 image processed by @i_ameztoy 🙏 https://t.co/6tLLlrclYT

item.description: Apriamo i dati su #obiezione Con @chiaralalli abbiamo lavorato a una inchiesta facendo accesso civici. Questi dati (bellissimi e speriamo presto più ricchi) scadranno. #opendata adesso. Questa la nostra prima mappa e i primi numeri https://t.co/PWeScx7I2i

item.title: #fr @ 1446817253262086144
item.description: @smetsjp @JeromeColombain @gchampeau @babgi @clever_cloud Je veux bien une définition du cloud à la ramasse ? Un cloud qui laisserait ses clients exposés à des failles grave comme Azure ? Qui planterait sur 6h comme Facebook ? Ou qui pratique l’open data radical comme twitch et aws ?

item.title: #de @ 1446799218916700162
item.description: Auch heute haben Bürger*innen gemeinsam mit @reedu_de im @FuturiumD #Berlin die #senseBox:Bike erfolgreich zusammengebaut 👍 Die „on the road“ gemessenen #OpenData zu Radfahren und #Verkehr werden an @openSenseMap gesendet, visualisiert und im #Futurium diskutiert #CitizenScience https://t.co/xDbzG4bhAU

item.title: #en @ 1446600930439356422
item.description:
If you're wondering why Houston lags behind other cities in publishing open data and engaging communities around public tech projects, I wrote this piece for you.
Thank you @RDAHouston for helping shine a light on these issues in our city! https://t.co/1YRK5yJP1N https://t.co/o8ty8b3eEt

item.title: #en @ 1446593367526318085
item.description: Now on Cite Digital, Katya Abazajian @katyaabaz, examines the City of Houston’s open data processes and finds them to be lagging behind those of other cities. She examines the many reasons why this is a difficult task in Houston. Read her analysis, https://t.co/Tq2NvFQ1NI. https://t.co/RWNgG2sjTJ

item.description: Open Data inspireert om andere onderzoekers hun data en protocols ook open te maken. Onze phd student @DFilioglou & Safoora Kamjan zijn pioniers in dit voor de gebieden waar ze werken. Ik ben zeker dat we zullen straks meer #opendata krijgen ook van andere onderzoekers

item.title: #en @ 1446478129439158273
item.description:
Congrats to @shellyrauvola for this awesome work!🎉
This paper has it all:
- Theoretical integration and empirical demonstration! - Preregistered hypotheses/methods! - Open data/code! - Cross-validation in a holdout sample! - Results that question long-held assumptions! https://t.co/atEffEGvb2

Na setkání byla nově zvolená předsedkyně RNDr. Taťána Míková, která vystřídala doc. RNDr. Tomáše Halenku, CSc. https://t.co/CleEV6rLKl

item.title: #th @ 1446383831385141249

https://t.co/3mCXLO8D7e

#ไปให้ถึงก่อนยุบสภา

item.title: #th @ 1446372171983376388
item.description: (3) ผมจึงขอใช้โอกาสนี้ พยายามไปหาพี่น้องประชาชนทุกคนให้ถึงหน้าบ้าน เพื่อพูดคุยและรับฟังปัญหาของพี่น้องชาวบางแคแบบตัวต่อตัว โดยทุกท่านสามารถดูข้อมูลเปิด (Open Data) เพื่อติดตามการทำงานของผู้แทนของทุกท่านได้ที่นี่ครับ https://t.co/Sgq7fEf9zR
